mapper.insert: INSERT INTO fx_board (board_id, board_title, board_writer, board_date, board_content, board_type) VALUES (fx_board_seq.NEXTVAL, #{boardTitle}, #{boardWriter}, SYSDATE, #{boardContent}, #{boardType})
